name: Dandy Writing Game Desk
description: The Dandy Writing Game Desk is the ultimate luxury piece of furniture. With multiple compartments and purposes, one can use this piece as a work surface or convert this into a backgammon game table. Pair this with its matching stools. Currently made to order 8-10 weeks. Handmade Antique Natural Shagreen surface, bronze-patina brass legs. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines.
